body:
Although the official download repo is at http://www.cs.virginia.edu/stream/FTP/Code/, it can't be used by Spack since it isn't a tarball. I spoke with the developer, but he didn't seem too interested in packaging it in this way. I ended up using a mirror, which should be fine for our purposes. See #823 for relevant discussion.

I would also like to build this package for multiple architectures, as mentioned in #974. Any suggestions for that would be appreciated.
title: Add STREAM benchmark package
